mapper.select: SELECT la.lecture_approval_no lectureApprovalNo , la.lecture_approval_title lectureApprovalTitle , la.lecturer lecturer , e.employee_name employeeName , la.lecture_approval_status lectureApprovalStatusCode , c1.`name` lectureApprovalStatus FROM lecture_approval la LEFT OUTER JOIN employee e ON la.lecturer = e.employee_no LEFT OUTER JOIN common c1 ON la.lecture_approval_status = c1.code WHERE la.use_yn = 1 AND la.lecturer = #{employeeNo}
